steps.name: Before Each Hook
Log out and open the Home page
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-CCKFn-750-U-Recip-YDnxu@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-CCKFn-750-U-Recip-YDnxu
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.prolinker.com/account/organization/invite?token=fa1bc139cd32c218d7047306dd7e3c62d82e0190ua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-CCKFn-750-U-Send-YDnxu 92254
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-CCKFn-750-U-Send-YDnxu
Click "ACCEPT"
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-CCKFn-750-U-Send-YDnxu 92254
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-CCKFn-750-U-Recip-YDnxu 44280
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
